name: Star Trapper
description:
A game about selling drugs...in space!

Berkeley is on a mission to save his sick mother. Her hospital bills are out of this world and in order to make the money, Berkeley must learn how to hustle!

Travel the galaxy and sell drugs to save her! Explore each planet and find different ways to make money!

             COMING SOON 2020

  • Top down RPG style mixed with vertical shoot-em-up missions
  • Bright and colorful 2D sprites
  • Comic book style illustrations
  • Original soundtrack
  • Story rich

DEMO CONTROLS:

  • Arrow keys or WSAD = Movement
  • Space = Interaction
  • F = Fullscreen

(PRESS ESC IN *DEMO* ROOM FOR PAUSE MENU)
